text: Bob's is the first Brazilian fast food chain, founded in 1952. Bob's may also refer to: ==Businesses== * Bob's Big Boy, an American restaurant chain * Bob's-Cola, a defunct American soft drink company * Bob's Discount Furniture, a privately owned chain in the eastern United States * Bob's Red Mill, an Oregon-based grain company * Bob's Stores, a defunct clothing retail chain of the United States * Bob's Watches, an online marketplace for the resale of Rolex watches ==Places== * Bob's Lake (disambiguation), three lakes in Ontario, Canada * Bob's Creek (Ontario), Canada ==Other== * Bob's Burgers, an American animated sitcom * Bob's Return, a racehorse ==See also== * Bob (disambiguation)
title: Bob's (disambiguation)
